first_translate: I’m terrified...
...of you hating me.
siegren.
let’s go over there for  a second.
can you lean forward just a little bit?
can you lean forward just a little bit?
like this?
fiona,
what are you trying t--
that’ll do.
are you...
...trying to torment me?
no, I was thinking we could make up like that.

hangle: 너도 아까 일은 더 이상 신경 쓰지 마.
first_translate: and don’t worry about what happened earlier anymore either.
did it hurt?
in some ways.
fiona.
may I kiss you?
no.
it makes me want to hit you instead.
try holding back.
I’m sorry, siegern.
I really am terrible.

hangle: 너에게 마음을 다 열지 못하는 주제에
first_translate: even though I haven’t opened my heart completely to you yet,

hangle: 네가 나에게 휘둘리는 모습을 확인하니 기분이 좋다니.
first_translate: the fact that I can see how much control I have over you is making me feel good.
siegren.
even if I haven’t fully opened myself up to you,
know that I care most deeply about you.
please always remember that.
well then, I shall take my leave now.
fiona.

hangle: 나에 관한 거 말고, 네 행복은 뭐야?
first_translate: apart from things related to me, what else brings you happiness?
my happiness?
hmm...
well...
I don’t know.
I must’ve had something at one point.

hangle: 이 세계에 와서 살아남기 위해 발버둥 치는 동안
first_translate: but while struggling to survive after coming into this world,
I forgot all about my own happiness.

hangle: 이젠 내가 바라는 게 별로 떠오르질 않아.
first_translate: now, nothing comes to mind when I think about what I truly desire.

hangle: 이게 나의 가장 큰 문제일지도 모르지…
first_translate: this might actually be my biggest problem...
lady fiona.

hangle: 오늘은 프리실라 가문의 무도회에 가시는 날이었죠?
first_translate: today is the day of house priscilla's ball, isn’t it?
yes, may I ask you to help me get ready?
while you’re doing so, I will focus on work.
of course!

hangle: 그러고 보니, 부탁한 서류들을 전부 정리해 주셨네요.
first_translate: come to think of it, you finished organizing those documents I asked you to sort through.
as always, thank you very much.
haha, it’s only part of my job.
you needn’t hesitate to request anything more as well.
celine is such an angel.

hangle: 하긴 천사가 아니었다면 아벨의 유모를 할 수 없었겠지.
first_translate: then again, she wouldn’t have been able to become abel’s nanny otherwise.

hangle: 그런데 아벨은 어떻게 저 온화함을 하나도 배우지 못했을까…
first_translate: still, why didn’t any of her kindness rub off onto him...?
your grace... how has your stay been thus far?
pardon?
a dead land appeared once more?

hangle: 본래라면 이렇게 자주, 무작위로 나타나지는 않았을 텐데.
first_translate: normally, they shouldn’t appear this frequently or randomly.

hangle: 지도에 죽은 땅이 나타난 장소를 표시해 본 적도 있었지만,
first_translate: I tried marking down where each dead land showed up on a map before,
but no particular pattern stood out.

hangle: 시그렌이 원작과 달리 날 좋아하게 된 건 백번 양보해서 납득한다 쳐.
first_translate: if I were to give him the benefit of the doubt, perhaps he fell for me because we became close friends first.
because we became close friends first.

hangle: 하지만 어둠은 이렇게 된 이유를 알 수가 없다.
first_translate: but I still cannot understand why darkness turned out like this.

hangle: 사냥 대회 때 생긴 죽은 땅에선 별다른 단서를 못 잡았다고들 하고.
first_translate: apparently, people weren’t able to find any clues regarding the dead lands created during the hunting competition.

hangle: 일단 어둠을 어떻게 할지 대책을 생각해두는 것도 좋겠어.
first_translate: for now, it’d probably be best to come up with a plan on how to deal with darkness.

hangle: 어둠을 없애는 것에 필요한 사람은 셋.
first_translate: to eliminate darkness, three people are needed:
eunice,
siegren,
and fiona.
darkness doesn’t possess a physical form.
thus, in order to defeat him,

hangle: 어둠을 몸에 가둘 수 있는 그릇이 필요하다.
first_translate: a vessel capable of containing his body within theirs is required.

hangle: 하지만 그릇은 아무나 될 수 있는 게 아니다.
first_translate: not anyone can serve as a vessel, however.

hangle: 어둠과 몸이 닿고도 몸을 유지할 만한 사람이어야 한다.
first_translate: they would have to be someone whose body won’t fall apart even upon contact with darkness.
in other words, someone like fiona.

hangle: 원작에서는 유니스의 힘으로 날뛰는 피오나의 몸에 어둠을 밀어 넣고,
first_translate: in the original story, using eunice’s powers, fiona forced darkness inside her body which was being controlled by him.

hangle: 시그렌이 그 몸과 싸워서 간신히 승리를 쟁취했다.
first_translate: siegren fought against that body and barely managed to emerge victorious.
if “fiona” becomes the vessel here too, everything will be solved.
but that means I’ll die.
honestly speaking, I don’t wish to meet that end.
I want to live.

hangle: 유니스의 능력이 어느 수준까지 올라왔는지 파악해야 하고,
first_translate: I need to figure out exactly how powerful eunice’s abilities currently are,
and investigate darkness further.

hangle: 어둠을 몸에 담을 사람을 구하는 것도 큰일이야.
first_translate: on top of that, finding another person to contain darkness within their body is also going to be difficult.

hangle: 게다가 어쩐지 나 대신 죽는 것처럼 느껴져서 마음이 안 좋아.
first_translate: plus, it feels like I’m sending them to death in place of myself, so I'm not comfortable with it.

hangle: 원작의 피오나에게도 죄를 지은 기분이 들어.
first_translate: I almost feel guilty toward the fiona from the novel.

hangle: 그러고 보니, 원작의 피오나는 어디로 간 걸까?
first_translate: come to think of it, where did the fiona from the novel disappear to anyway?

hangle: 내가 이 몸에 있으니 자연스레 사라졌을까?
first_translate: did she naturally vanish since I took over this body?
given that hers was an unhappy life,

hangle: 차라리 이 자리에 없는 게 그녀에게는 다행일지도…
first_translate: it might be fortunate for her that she’s gone...
lady fiona...
do you think it'd be better to let your hair down today?
huh?
why?
oh dear, you hadn’t noticed?

hangle: 아가씨 목에 벌레 물린 자국이 있어요.
first_translate: there’s a bug bite mark on your neck.
s-siegren...!
